qas.question: Who is the main character in Taxi Driver?
What street is mentioned in the movie Taxi Driver as the location where a cab driver is assaulted?
Which character in Taxi Driver deemed 122nd Street as "Mau Mau Land"?
What is the term given to 122nd Street by Wizard in Taxi Driver indicating the area is majority black?

context: <a1_0>122nd Street<a1_0/> is mentioned in the movie Taxi Driver by main character <a0_0>Travis Bickle<a0_0/> as the location where a fellow cab driver is assaulted with a knife. The street and the surrounding neighborhood of <a4_0>Harlem<a4_0/> is then referred to as <a3_0>"Mau Mau Land"<a3_0/> by another character named <a2_0>Wizard<a2_0/>, slang indicating it is a majority black area.
